projects.name: Adam Project
description: Designed and built a modular, scalable Angular front-end architecture, enabling long-term flexibility and fast iteration on new features.
Created a design-aligned, reusable component library, documented for future developer use and scalable team collaboration.
Championed development standards: introduced strict linting, enforced code reviews, and built onboarding tools to help new team members integrate faster.

projects.name: SOURCE.AG
description: Built a high-performance web application using Next.js for frontend and NestJS for backend, prioritizing speed and SSR optimization.
Integrated dynamic data fetching and fine-tuned API performance to deliver a seamless, real-time user experience.
Worked hand-in-hand with the product owner to prioritize features, rapidly prototyping and iterating to meet tight timelines.
Deployed via Vercel, optimizing build pipelines and leveraging serverless infrastructure for stability at scale.
